name: Time Farm (Mini Jam 126: Lost)
description:
Info:

Time Farm is a 2D Top-Down shooter inspired by Faith: The Unholy Trinity made for the MiniJam 126.

Mechanics:

Walk over the yellow farm to plant a clock, wait for it to grow, maybe need to water it, and harvest it with the stickle.

While fending of creatures of Hell.

iKeys:

WASD/Arrow keys

Mouse & Left-Click

Credits:

Paolotto Games (Artist, Page Design)

Daheer (Programmer)

Paolotto: I am not that happy with how it turned out.
